COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x102
STRING: Fifty minutes past nine in the morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e
STRING: After I woke up, got dressed and posted my letter, it
was nearly time for my appointment with Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x124
STRING: Torta was meticulous about time, so there'd be a knock
on my door soon, probably.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a
STRING: Including the trip to the mailbox, I'd spent more time
than I would have if I'd gone to school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x150
STRING: The letter was only on Mondays, but I knew things
wouldn't change much for the rest of the week anyway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x166
STRING: I saved the time putting on the uniform and walking to
school, which came up to around half an hour.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x186
STRING: If I could just sleep in without caring about the clock,
once a week or so...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b8
STRING: [Phorni] “Any time now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ce
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm...? Uh, yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e4
STRING: Phorni must have known what was going on, as she
didn't mention any names.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x226
STRING: [Phorni] “There we go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23c
STRING: [Chris] “It's open!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x260
STRING: I raised my voice so I could be heard through the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2aa
STRING: [Torta] “How careless.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c0
STRING: [Chris] “I went to post a letter just now, and I left the
door unlocked, that's all. I knew you were coming.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fc
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x312
STRING: [Chris] “I left a towel by the door too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x344
STRING: [Torta] “Got it, thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35a
STRING: After coming back from the mailbox, I'd put it out just
for Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x370
STRING: Torta picked up the towel and barely dried her hair
before entering the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38e
STRING: [Torta] “Alright. Shall we?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a4
STRING: [Chris] “You look very pleased.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d6
STRING: [Torta] “It's because you look so put off, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ec
STRING: [Chris] “Gah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41e
STRING: [Torta] “I'm kidding. I get to sing songs I like the whole
day, right? Of course I'm happy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43e
STRING: [Chris] “I see...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x470
STRING: [Torta] “You seem to dislike practice, Chris, but didn't
you love to play the Fortelle when we were kids?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x490
STRING: [Chris] “...Look, I still like playing the Fortelle. It's just...
Practice is, you know...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4cc
STRING: [Torta] “What about it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e2
STRING: [Chris] “It feels like I'm being forced to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x514
STRING: [Torta] “It seems you won't unless you're forced to,
however?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52a
STRING: [Chris] “But in the process, I started to hate practicing...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55c
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm... It got complicated, is that it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x572
STRING: [Chris] “...Whatever. So, let's begin.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a4
STRING: [Torta] “Okay. By the way, I'll let you take a break in the
afternoon, don't worry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c4
STRING: [Chris] “How about we... Take breaks if we perform
well?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f6
STRING: [Torta] “No way. I have to ask, why are you always
trying to take the easy way out?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x616
STRING: [Chris] “That's not it. We don't want to burn ourselves
out, is what I'm saying.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x652
STRING: [Torta] “If you're that confident about your Fortelle
playing, then I don't mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x672
STRING: [Chris] “Ugh... When you put it that way...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a4
STRING: [Torta] “Right? The recital's less than a month away, so
the truth is, no matter how much we practice it's never
going to be enough.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c4
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f6
STRING: [Torta] “Of course, Chris, as you say burnout is a bad
thing, but I'll handle that part, so all you have to do is
follow my lead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x73c
STRING: [Phorni] “Wow, so reliable.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x752
STRING: ...Too reliable.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77a
STRING: [Phorni] “How great for you, Chris. Plus, I quite enjoy
listening to you practice, so that's great for me too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x79a
STRING: ...I didn't ask for your opinion.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c2
STRING: [Torta] “Alright, let's begin.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d8
STRING: ...And you, please start asking people for their opinions.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x876
STRING: Somehow or other, once we started practicing, it didn't
seem so bad after all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x88c
STRING: Also, once the music started, the lethargy I'd had earlier
suddenly stopped bothering me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8be
STRING: [Torta] “Phew... Chris, you're not doing too bad.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d4
STRING: [Chris] “You too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ea
STRING: The time we spent making music and performing
ensembles like this, was just simply enjoyable.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x900
STRING: Of course we had to make the necessary corrections:
missed notes here, timing was off there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x920
STRING: But still, playing music I liked, as much as I wanted to...
That really was happiness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x936
STRING: If I wanted to stay in the world of music my whole life,
however, I'm sure things would be different.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x94c
STRING: That's why I was worried about all this, perhaps.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x962
STRING: ...Although that wasn't the only worry I had.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x98a
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, let's keep up the pace.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a0
STRING: [Chris] “Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b6
STRING: Was it wrong, after all, to simply enjoy this time?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9cc
STRING: At the very least, I had to think of Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d8
STRING: At the same time, I wasn't about to think only about the
music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e4
STRING: Torta's voice, the way she felt, all these formed part of
the moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9fa
STRING: Of course this would be the case no matter whom I was
performing with, but that was no excuse.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa10
STRING: Only... My feelings weren't part of the moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa1c
STRING: I recalled the rumor, something Torta had mentioned
before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa28
STRING: Such moments were, indeed, more than enough reason
to fall in love with one's partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5a
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm...? What's the matter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa70
STRING: [Chris] “It's nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa2
STRING: [Torta] “Are you sure...? Well, if you say so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab8
STRING: It wasn't my best attempt at deflection, but that's what I
said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xace
STRING: Torta didn't seem to notice anything, and in the end,
she replied cheerfully.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae4
STRING: [Chris] “Let's continue. Once more, from the top?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb16
STRING: [Torta] “...Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb2c
STRING: I put my hands on the keys, looked at her, and started
playing the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb70
STRING: [Torta] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb86
STRING: Torta sighed deeply and looked at me without saying
anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb9c
STRING: [Chris] “That didn't go so well, huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbce
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, the sound was good, but something was
off.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe4
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc16
STRING: [Torta] “That's okay, as long as the recital goes well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc2c
STRING: Torta was trying to encourage me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc38
STRING: But those words spoke volumes about how that last
performance went.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc44
STRING: Normally, somehow or other, once we started
practicing, it wouldn't seem that bad after all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5a
STRING: Also, once the music started, my pre-practice lethargy
would suddenly stop bothering me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc70
STRING: But today... I just wasn't feeling it today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc7c
STRING: I was afraid of the feeling of enjoyment itself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc88
STRING: I felt as if I was listening, with a cold stare, to our
performance from a distance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc9e
STRING: I was certain that my thoughts from yesterday were
behind all this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb4
STRING: I felt that if I did find joy in music, I'd lose something
very important.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc0
STRING: And I also felt that by finding joy, I would lose
something equally important as well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf2
STRING: [Torta] “Look, I didn't say it was all bad, what matters
now is focusing on practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd12
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, you're right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd30
STRING: [Torta] “Good, then let's go again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd46
STRING: [Chris] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd6a
STRING: I put my hands on the keys, looked at her, and started
playing the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb6
STRING: Both of us were starting to feel that we'd practiced
enough for the day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc2
STRING: Torta sat down and I swiveled my chair around; we
were ready to stop.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf4
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, I guess that's enough for today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe0a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, good job.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe20
STRING: For some reason, Phorni had listened quietly to us
practice today too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe36
STRING: She'd sung a lot yesterday... Of course that wasn't why;
she was probably observing the subtle differences
between us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe56
STRING: She kept comparing me to Torta, sometimes with a
worried look, other times looking very bored.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe6c
STRING: Phorni had her own take on the situation, it seemed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe78
STRING: She was sitting on the desk, her legs dangling freely, as
she watched us the whole time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeaa
STRING: [Torta] “What are you doing for dinner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec0
STRING: [Chris] “I'll just throw something together here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef2
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, I see. Well, Grandma said this morning that
you could come over.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf12
STRING: [Chris] “Really? But it's not nice to impose on you every
day...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf44
STRING: [Torta] “That's... She's saying that it's okay, don't you
get it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf64
STRING: [Chris] “I get it. But the person being invited is always
going to feel some hesitation, no matter what they're
told.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfaa
STRING: [Torta] “Are you saying you feel hesitant around me or
Grandma?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc0
STRING: [Chris] “That was just an example. Even if someone told
you not to worry about something, you'd still worry a
little, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xffc
STRING: [Torta] “Well, I get what you're saying. But whatever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101c
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, you should head home early, Ninna
might be waiting for you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1058
STRING: [Torta] “But, you said that you didn't know what you
were doing for dinner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106e
STRING: [Chris] “Maybe you could let me know earlier next time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10aa
STRING: [Torta] “Ah... Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f0
STRING: “Shall we eat together?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1104
STRING: If I'd asked Torta, she'd probably have said yes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x111a
STRING: And I also knew that she was waiting for me to ask.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1126
STRING: That was precisely why I feigned ignorance and,
deciding she had to eat at home, suggested that she
head back early.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1146
STRING: Phorni was present at the time, and she may have
helped me, in fact.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x115c
STRING: Phorni was a strong reminder of Arie's existence, and
her being there gave me the strength of will to say what
I had to say.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x117c
STRING: A look of sadness came over Torta's face for just a
moment, then vanished.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ae
STRING: [Torta] “I'll be off then. Practice at my house tomorrow?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ce
STRING: [Chris] “Uh, sure...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ec
STRING: [Torta] “Then how about alternate days? Though there's
only a week left till the start of school.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120c
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, that's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x123e
STRING: [Torta] “It's settled, then. Ten o'clock tomorrow at my
house?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1254
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, it's fine even if we start a little later than
we do at school.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1286
STRING: [Torta] “Excellent. See you tomorrow, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x129c
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... The sky is...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ce
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm? Ah... From the window, at least, it
doesn't look that dark outside. It's okay, I can walk
home by myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1302
STRING: [Chris] “I see...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1318
STRING: The day before Natale, I'd followed her into the city
because it was dangerous at night.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x132e
STRING: Even though it was still bright out... Was it okay for her
to walk home alone?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x133a
STRING: I'm sure anyone would've found that question ridiculous.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1350
STRING: [Chris] “...Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1382
STRING: [Torta] “For what?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1398
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... Nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b6
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, see you tomorrow. Things will get ugly if
you're late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13cc
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Okay, see you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1400
STRING: Torta waved and smiled, then the door closed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x140c
STRING: It seemed louder than usual, but maybe I was imagining
it.
